input_text:
Job Title: Fleet Coordinator

Location: Castle Rock, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Customer Service, Distribution

Description:
Are you a motivated individual with a passion for efficient fleet management? Are you Excel savvy? Join SRP as a Fleet Coordinator!
Driven by our mission to exceed expectations through passion, performance and profitability.Since our founding as a regional distributor of sunglasses in 1969, SRP has grown into an international leader providing in-store merchandising solutions to a wide variety of retail partners and their consumers. We have built relationships with thousands of international, national, and regional retailers who rely on our customized solutions in more than 60,000+ locations across the U.S. and Canada. With warehouse facilities in several states and service reps covering all regions of the country, there isn't a retail location we can't service. 
For this role, we’ll look to you to: Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal transportation regulations.Communicate effectively with drivers, providing necessary information and support.Maintain accurate records of vehicle maintenance, repairs, and other relevant data.Collaborate with other departments to optimize overall fleet operations.Schedule and oversee regular maintenance and repairs for the fleet.Coordinate vehicle assignments and monitor utilization to ensure efficiency.Track fuel consumption and implement strategies for cost savings.
Experience/Qualifications:Three to five years of experience in fleet management, logistics or a related field. Knowledge of transportation regulations and best practices.Strong organizational and multitasking skills.Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.Proficient in using fleet management software and tools.Problem-solving and decision-making skills.Intermediate proficiency with Excel.
Join us, and let’s deliver data-driven retail solutions.SRP’s mission is to exceed expectations through passion, performance and profitability. It’s an exciting time for our company and if you’re ready to unleash your potential to help fulfil our mission and vision, apply today.
We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, political affiliation, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, marital status, or veteran (U.S.) status. The company will provide accommodation to applicants, including those with disabilities, during the recruitment process, in accordance with applicable laws.
The gross hourly range for this position is $21.63 - $26.44. This range represents the anticipated low and high end of the salary for this position. Actual salaries will vary and are based on factors such as a candidate’s qualifications, skills, and competencies.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Fleet Coordinator
output_json.summary: Join SRP as a Fleet Coordinator with a passion for efficient fleet management and Excel proficiency.
soft_skills: Intermediate proficiency with fleet management software and tools
job_responsibilities: Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal transportation regulations
Communicate effectively with drivers, providing necessary information and support
Maintain accurate records of vehicle maintenance, repairs, and other relevant data
Collaborate with other departments to optimize overall fleet operations
Schedule and oversee regular maintenance and repairs for the fleet
Coordinate vehicle assignments and monitor utilization to ensure efficiency
Track fuel consumption and implement strategies for cost savings
output_json.company_information: SRP is an international leader providing in-store merchandising solutions to retail partners and consumers.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: The company does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, political affiliation, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, marital status, or veteran status.
